Really good game! I haven't played the first one but i still understand the story plot, and i really like the humour that GladOs uses and i crack up every single time she tries to insult you or threaten you to stop giving your co-op partner a high five or when you try to harm them its priceless! Definitely recommend if you've played portal 1, like puzzle games with enjoyable missions (so to speak), or just over all dark humour from a very angry robot. You'll thank me later when you've seen what happens at the end of the single player story!

S-tier puzzle + co-op puzzle game.

Nails the teamwork and communication aspects of co-op. There isn't voice chat, but the emotes are hilarious and get the job done in a humorous way.

As a singleplayer game, it's superb. The OST is perfectly minimal and couldn't have been pulled off much better. 
One of my favourite things about the game is the way the soundtrack adapts to how you interact with the game. It's better you experience the adaptability of the music yourself - buy this game.

Portal 2 is an absolute masterpiece.  From the gameplay to the writing everything is so close to perfection.  This is one of if not the best games ever made.  This game is worth every single cent on the price tag and everyone should play it.  Also it has Stephen Merchant in it so its essentially a must play.

I really enjoy playing this game.  The puzzles are really fun to figure out.  I don't like the music so I turn the music off and the sound down, and then I play my own music or play youtube videos for audio.  After I finish Portal 2 I might get Portal 1 as I've heard it is pretty good as well.
nice story game, worth the money

На мой взгляд, в этой игре всё прекрасно: саундтрек, озвучка, сюжет, графика, сеттинг и я могу ещё долго перечислять. Нет, разумеется минусы тоже есть, но они настолько маленькие и незаметные, что о них говорить просто не имеет смысла. Я всё ещё под впечатлением, и без сомнений называю эту игру шедевром!!!

I love both portal games. The story was really captivating and the world building and design makes you want to learn more about the world. Game really makes me love science even more.
is good

Amazing story-telling, hilarious characters and voice lines, clever mechanics, and a lot of unexpected twists. There was one time in the entire game where I was not enjoying it, and that was Chapter 8's puzzles. I just feel like they were a little unfair, but that's just personal preference. But for a game released in 2011, it is insanely impressive and still holds up incredibly well to this day. Still one of my favorite single-player games ever.
